i DOWNLOADED this game for one reason: STAY AWAY. The game is wonderfully addictive, and fun to play. That said, Blizz/Acty is the WORST of companies to support. Between the corporate crap that makes the news, how they treat the player base is worse. Between the lies of promises made at the start of OW2("i'm sorry" does not cut it as a apology while blaming "resources" ie US as players who want more content) to the horrible matchmaking, the god awful 5v5 gameplay(i would avoid open queue of any kind unless you're a masochistic type), the monetary gouging every two months for battlepasses and new skins for 20 dollars EVERY week, they deserve the Overwhelming Negative reviews on DAY ONE. Just do not join up. Avoid this like the plauge. Go watch Adult visual novels on Steam like everyone else. Go rent a room at a hotel, just you and your significant other and do not download and play this game. I LITERALLY SACRIFICED HARD DRIVE SPACE JUST SO YOU ALL CAN HEED MY WARNING AND RUN, RUN FOR THE HILLS, RUN FOR YOUR LIVES. Think of the kittens.

You deserve this, Blizzard.

Your CEO's groping women, breast milk stolen out of the employee lounge, illegal strike busting, not to mention the at this point basic quadrupling down on greedy business practices that are only harmful to the consumer. These are only a miniscule fraction of the things Blizzard tries to sweep under the rug, saving new announcements to share mere hours after the latest article comes out about how toxic this company truly is.

I hated Overwatch ever since they removed all movement tech and skill outside of the original BETA. I hated it for twisting online gaming into a parody of itself. I knew people would hate it eventually, like a kinder egg toy, destined for the trash bin when what little fun has been had. And finally what I was proven right.

You deserve this. And my joy couldn't be sweeter.

Overwatch - это отличная игра... Была в 2016.

Вторая часть - это какая-то комедия.

Изменили систему рейтинга, вместо нормальных цифр, теперь какие-то непонятные формулы.
Изменили монетизацию, теперь бесплатно ничего не получишь.
Отменили PvE, ради которого и затеяли изначально вторую часть.

《诗经·彼阳》
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。

玩归玩，差评还是要给的
  依稀记得那是17年的寒假，老爸才给家里配了一台电脑，那时候我正好差不多要过生日了，就跟我爸磨了好久，才同意给我买了守望先锋98的标准版
  还记得第一个金皮是路霸的八戒，还记得周末跟同学一起连麦法鸡天使的双飞，还记得有时候会去麦克雷的练枪房，一待能在那待好久，就这样玩了一年多吧，因为后来要中考，老爸就把电脑搬出去了，就这样我也好久没再玩过守望了
  今年年初，偶然一次机会，我去到初中同学家里，发现他还在玩着守望，我也因此借着他的电脑登上了我的号，看看都变成什么样了
  她确实变了，从6v6变成了5v5，从98变成38再变成免费，麦爹的名字也变成了卡姓男子
再到后来，就是大家熟知的暴雪和网易闹掰事件，大批守望难民转到了Apex，我也是其中之一（不过现在的重生也很烂就是了）
  回过头来看，守望作为我第一个入手的游戏，她确实承载了我不少的愉快记忆，现在即使她回来了，也无法代替我记忆中那个曾经的她
  （所以考迪克什么时候能死啊艹）
